entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
